alert.note: Alert for Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 7:09PM CST until March 15 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi...Arkansas... Mississippi River at Tunica Mhoon Landing For the Lower Mississippi River...including Tiptonville, Caruthersville, Osceola, Memphis, Tunica Mhoon Landing, Helena... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY, MARCH 15... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Tunica Mhoon Landing. * WHEN...Until Tuesday, March 15. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, In Mississippi, lots nearest Tunica Cutoff Lake in Lakeview are under water. South end of Mhoon Landing Park is beginning to flood. In Arkansas, roads from the levee to Buck Island are under water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM CST Monday the stage was 31.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 31.5 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
